data.text:
2019 Dove Award Winners

The Gospel Music Association celebrated the 50th Annual Dove Awards in Nashville, TN last week.

The big winners of the night was Lauren Daigle, who took home three awards. Daigle won awards for “Song of the Year,” “Artist of the Year” and “Pop/Contemporary Album of the Year.” First-time winners of the night included Phil Wickham for “Worship Recorded Song of the Year.”

One really cool performance included Steven Curtis Chapman, Amy Grant, CeCe Winans, and Michael W. Smith as well as a Bill and Gloria Gaither! The list of performers included Casting Crowns, Matthew West, Hillsong Worship, MercyMe, TobyMac, and many more!

Here is the complete list of 2019 GMA Dove Award Winners
